mapper.select: select ai.alt_ingre_code,ai.raw_ingre_name,ai.alter_ingre_name,ai.brief_desc,ai.reg_date,ai.m_id from alternative_ingredients_link al ,alternative_ingredients ai where al.rcp_code = #{code} and al.alt_ingre_code = ai.alt_ingre_code
mapper.insert: insert into recipe_tips(cooking_code, m_id, user_tip, rcp_code) values(#{cooking_code}, #{m_id}, #{user_tip}, #{rcp_code})
mapper.delete: delete from recipe_tips where m_id = #{m_id} and tip_code =#{tip_code}
mapper.select: select * from recipe_cookings where rcp_code = #{code} order by cooking_order
select * from recipe_basics where rcp_name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')

select rb.rcp_code,rb.rcp_name,rb.rcp_desc,rb.rcp_t_code,rb.rcp_cooking_time,rb.rcp_t,rb.rcp_calory,rb.rcp_size,rb.rcp_level,rb.rcp_pic1,rb.reg_date,rb.m_id from recipe_ingredients ri, recipe_basics rb where ingre_name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') and ri.rcp_code = rb.rcp_code
select * from recipe_basics a, myrecipes b where a.rcp_code = b.rcp_code and b.m_id = #{name};
select * from myrecipes where m_id = #{m_id} and rcp_code =#{rcp_code}
mapper.delete: delete from myrecipes where m_id = #{m_id} and rcp_code =#{rcp_code}
mapper.insert: insert into boardlist(img_code, title, m_id, img_1, desc_1, img_2, desc_2 , img_3, desc_3, img_4, desc_4, img_5, desc_5, img_6, desc_6) values(#{img_code}, #{title}, #{m_id}, #{img_1}, #{desc_1}, #{img_2}, #{desc_2}, #{img_3}, #{desc_3}, #{img_4}, #{desc_4}, #{img_5}, #{desc_5}, #{img_6}, #{desc_6})
mapper.select: select img_code, title, m_id from boardlist;
mapper.update: update boardlist set title=#{title}, img_1=#{img_1}, desc_1=#{desc_1}, img_2=#{img_2}, desc_2=#{desc_2}, img_3=#{img_3}, desc_3=#{desc_3}, img_4=#{img_4}, desc_4=#{desc_4}, img_5=#{img_5}, desc_5=#{desc_5}, img_6=#{img_6}, desc_6=#{desc_6} where img_code=#{img_code}
